place_description: A slow moving Monday morning. A fast paced Wednesday lunch break. An easy and pleasant Saturday afternoon. No matter where you are in your week (or your day), you can count on Salted Melon to have exactly what you need, sometimes before you know you need it.

reviews_data.review_text: We had an amazing brunch today at Salted Melon, not only because of the delicious food and drinks, but because of the phenomenal service from our sever Jonah. He was so thorough, attentive, and kind!

Hi! I absolutely loved eating here. The staff is so friendly and welcoming, especially Anna! She gives the best recommendations and is super nice throughout the ordering experience. I really enjoyed my food!

I had the pleasure of visiting this cute spot while traveling to the Charlotte area. The "Market Chop" salad with the bruleed goat cheese may be my new favorite meal! As a fan of goat cheese on salads and other dishes, it's hard to find at many restaurants. I love that they offer it and then to prep it like they do...oh my! So yummy! (Seriously, can you make that an appetizer? )
The young ladies who helped me with the menu and offered suggestions were absolutely delightful. The place was clean and the atmosphere was friendly. Definitely worth visiting anytime I'm in town!

Females who work there are anti male and accuse male workers of things they didn't do..don't go there
.

Casual, clean, and great food.

Salmon poke was really good.
Diverse menu that has something for everyone. Food was fresh and ambiance and was nice; Great addition to the area!
Tried this recently when I found that Panera down the street had closed, and it did not disappoint. Great option for lunch! Would be 5-stars except it's a bit pricey. Very quick service!
Thankful to have such a flavorful and healthy quick to-go or eat in spot like Salted Melon. To be in such a large city the options are few when it comes to clean eating as well as tasty!

I've been to the SouthEnd location & so was excited to try this one. Such a cute vibe! While it was busy, we didn't wait long at the counter to order & easily found a table. The service was good, friendly & fast. I had the truffle fries & the Summer Salmon bowl, but were delicious! Would be great for a quick lunch!
Food is unique and very good.  A lot of vegetarian options.
Great lunch place. I see lots of business people here

The place looks great! The service even better :) But this food is for someone that thinks pepper is spicy. All the food is extremely bland and with the $16 price tag my food came with I expected a lot more. How they managed to get a second location is a mystery, tons of better eats in Charlotte. My advice would be to actually focus on the food instead of an Instagram worthy dining room.

Had the street car bowl. It was rice, tomatos, corn, cilantro and peppers with steak, it was very chewy. Not a lot of flavor. Not impressed. It was $17 and I'm extremely disappointed. My daughter got the chicken Caesar wrap and the chicken was very dry and chewy and not cut up very well. Her wrap was $13.50. Not much flavor. She got a sprite that was $3.50 and a tiny iced cookie that was mediocre at best for $5.00.   We ended up throwing the meals in the trash. Definitely not going to return. Not good.

My wife and I visited this new location of Salted Melon and enjoyed it very much. Great food, location, staff was friendly, very clean here and the decor was very nice inside. This was a former Hubee Dee's chicken restaurant and they turned it very nice inside here.

This salted melon is different from the Southend location so there's not a market inside like you would see at Southend, but you have Harris Teeter right down the road so it's not a big deal for a market here.

The food was amazing along with the iced lattes we got! We definitely enjoyed this location a lot and will return back for sure.

As an FYI, parking does get super busy here so be aware of that when you come at prime time lunch or breakfast time. Make sure you also download their app so you can earn reward points! It definitely will help you in the long run!
Excellent restaurant, nice atmosphere. The employees are very attentive. very good reputation employees. Kitchen employees are always attentive to orders and everyone leaves on time.
